title: Champ Builds Outside The Meta
body:
Been trying to find new alternative builds to some champs to make playing a bit more fun. Don't get me wrong, playing the meta and doing well is fun because well...it's how they're played properly and it usually ends with succeeding. But I don't play this game competitively and I like playing champs differently to how they're usually played. For example; full AP Malphite. Probably one of my favourite builds in the game.

Anyone have any strange builds that suit the champ a lot better than you'd think?

replies.body: AP Rek'Sai. You stay underground and use your sonar beeps to constantly shoot out your missile!

AD braum
Never done it but it looks like fun

AP Varus
Support Shen
AD Malz
AD Fizz

>AD Fizz

Ummmmm that is completely meta (maybe less so since the patch)
